name: Comedy and Cocktails
bio:
New Deal Distillery  presents Comedy and Cocktails, a monthly stand-up showcase featuring top comic talent from Portland and beyond. Hosts Brandy Feit and Jason Traeger oversee the fun on the little stage in front of the distillery’s beautiful towering copper still. Join us for fine locally-crafted spirits and laughs. The series runs every 2nd Friday, March through August.

http://www.newdealdistillery.com/
